XII.ii.2.A.1.b
.
Who Can Be Paid the Special Allowance
The special allowance is paid
only
to the persons as designated by and at the rates and for the periods certified by the Social Security Administration (SSA).
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
